hero.subtitle: AI that reads your stars across Western, Vedic & Chinese astrology — so you know exactly when to act, when to wait, and what to do.

onboarding.title: Begin Your Journey
onboarding.subtitle: Enter your birth data to unlock your personal oracle. This is all we need to read your stars.
onboarding.dont_know_time: I don't know my birth time
onboarding.reduced_accuracy: Your readings will have reduced accuracy without an exact birth time. Some features (house analysis, nakshatra details) will be limited.
onboarding.city_hint: We use this for precise astronomical calculations.
onboarding.privacy_notice: Your birth data is encrypted and never shared with third parties. We believe your cosmic data is sacred.
onboarding.success_sub: Your first oracle will be ready in moments.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three steps to your personal oracle
howItWorks.step1_desc: Date, time, and location of birth. That's all we need.
howItWorks.step2_desc: Western, Vedic & Chinese agents process your chart simultaneously.
howItWorks.step3_desc: One synthesized daily oracle with actionable guidance.

oraclePreview.title: Your Daily Insight
oraclePreview.subtitle: A glimpse of what awaits you every morning
oraclePreview.best_desc: A surge of creative energy. Your ideas will be well-received — share them with confidence today.
oraclePreview.typical_desc: Steady progress on existing projects. Focus on details after 2 PM when Mercury trines your natal Moon.
oraclePreview.guidance_text: Trust the process. Your fire element is strong today — channel it into creation, not conflict. The evening brings clarity.

energyCalendar.title: Energy Navigator
energyCalendar.subtitle: See your energy flows. Plan your life accordingly.
energyCalendar.source: Synthesized from Western, Vedic & Chinese analysis
energyCalendar.hover_hint: Hover over a zone to see your energy analysis
energyCalendar.career_exp: Mars trines your 10th house — a power window for career moves opens between 10 AM and 1 PM.
energyCalendar.love_exp: Venus squares Neptune — romantic energy is dreamy but unreliable today. Wait for clarity.
energyCalendar.health_exp: Your Wood element is strong — physical energy peaks in the morning. Ideal for exercise.
energyCalendar.finance_exp: Saturn's influence asks for caution. Avoid large purchases until the weekend.
energyCalendar.creativity_exp: Mercury conjunct your natal Uranus — expect flashes of brilliance. Capture every idea.
energyCalendar.spiritual_exp: Moon enters your Nakshatra — a deeply contemplative day. Perfect for meditation.

rituals.title: Ritual Architect
rituals.subtitle: 2-minute personalized rituals to ground your daily energy
rituals.ritual_example: Stand facing east. Take 3 deep breaths, feeling the Metal element ground you. Organize one small space on your desk — this channels today's scattered Fire energy into focus.

pricing.title: Choose Your Path
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you're ready

trust.title: Built for Trust
trust.subtitle: Not another horoscope app. A precision instrument for self-awareness.
trust.badge_data_desc: Swiss Ephemeris precision — the same engine used by professional astrologers worldwide.
trust.badge_systems_desc: Western, Vedic & Chinese astrology analyzed simultaneously by specialized AI agents.
trust.badge_privacy_desc: Your birth data is encrypted and never shared. We believe your cosmic data is sacred.
trust.badge_learning_desc: The Quantum Mirror learns from your feedback, making every reading more accurate.

footer.tagline: Three ancient wisdoms. One personal oracle.
